com.xensource.xenapi

Class USBGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xensource.xenapi.XenAPIObject
      • com.xensource.xenapi.USBGroup

  • public class USBGroup
extends XenAPIObject
    A group of compatible USBs across the resource pool First published in XenServer 7.3.

      • removeFromOtherConfig

        public void removeFromOtherConfig(Connection c,
                         java.lang.String key)
                           throws Types.BadServerResponse,
                                  Types.XenAPIException,
                                  org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Remove the given key and its corresponding value from the other_config field of the given USB_group. If the key is not in that Map, then do nothing. First published in XenServer 7.3.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to remove
        Throws:
        Types.BadServerResponse
        Types.XenAPIException
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
